description.p: YabaSanshiro implements SS hardware with software, and you can play SS games on your computer.Due to copyright protection, Yaba Sanshiro does not include BIOS data and games. You can play the games you own by following the steps below.

ul.li: Convert the CD-ROM to a file using CD-ROM dump tool like "cd manipulator"
Place the generated file in "$HOME/.yabasanshiro/games/" directory.
Start YabaSanshiro and select "Open CD Tray" from the menu, then select "Close CD Tray"
